channel.title: My first primative sword
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2u73m3b.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2hi0xl3.png[/img]
Wires: [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2hy8g02.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/i2lwmg.png[/img]
Render: [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2yjprhy.png[/img]
Not too proud of this one. I've spent a good deal of time modeling, I'm just too much of a wiener to show people :c But yeah, I got the inspiration from a sword I saw someone upload back in August-September, and I decided to make my rendition of it. Constructive criticism plux.
If people are actually crazy enough to want this, then I'll release a drop model and an animated wielding model, gzipped and whatnot.

item.title: My first primative sword
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:16, topic:369801”][quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=465926.msg3410497#msg3410497 date=1290646152]
Very good. Got potential for sure, get a more professional program.
[/quote]
I had blender, but IMO it was too hard. Any recommendations?[/quote]Watch videos on youtube to get a firm grip on it all. You’ll be amazed at what you make later.

Read full topic

item.title: My first primative sword
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Java Is My Bitch:

Very good. Got potential for sure, get a more professional program.

I had blender, but IMO it was too hard. Any recommendations?

item.title: My first primative sword
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:13, topic:369801”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=465926.msg3407424#msg3407424 date=1290434722]

Maybe some texture on the handle, looks a bit smooth. Overall 6/10 for looks - better than anything I could do though.

Keep up the pratice.

Thanks :3
What kind of texture?

Like a leathery texture, or a shallow mosiac like thing, so there’s some sort of grip.
[/quote]

Fixed. And thanks, I never would have thought of leather :D[/quote]

Haha yeah I just noticed, fixed. /facepalm.

Read full topic

item.title: My first primative sword
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Reminds me of 0bbyme’s sword. Very nice for a beginning model. Colors are nice, hilt could use some work. And you don’t need and textures lol. And a spike texture? Never heard of a texture looking spiky lol. I think he actually means adding on to the model. But spikes would kill the theme of the model.

Read full topic

item.title: My first primative sword
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:9, topic:369801”]Looks like u used my tut.

In any case, not bad. Pretty solid structure. 5/10[/quote]

Thanks a million for making the tut. I would have been lost without it.

Read full topic
